#include<cstdio>
#include<stdlib.h>

long long int rev(long long int p)
{
 long long int sum=0;
 int mod;
 while(p)
 {
  mod=p%10;
  sum=(sum*10)+mod;
  p/=10;
 }
 return sum;
}

bool ispalin(long long int p)
{
 if(p==rev(p))
  return 1;
 return 0;
}
void sumpalin(long long int p,int i)
{
 if(ispalin(p))
  printf("%d %lld\n",i,p);
 else
  sumpalin(p+rev(p),i+1);
}

int main()
{
 long long int n;
 scanf("%lld",&n);
 while(n--)
 {
  long long int p;
  scanf("%lld",&p);
  sumpalin(p,0);
 }
 return 0;
}
